roleset.name: manner of speaking
roleset.note: SIGH-V NOTES: Member of VNcls manner_speaking-37.3. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sigh.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Sen. Cranston, as he returned to the capital last week from a one-day trip to inspect earthquake damage in San Francisco, sighed to an aide: ``Well, back to Keatingland.
example.arg: as he returned to the capital last week from a one-day trip to inspect earthquake damage in San Francisco

roleset.name: breathe heavily, once
roleset.note: SIGH-V NOTES: Member of Vncls nonverbal_expression-40.2. (from sigh.02-v)

example.name: ARG0
example.text: With the economic downturn , Wang Nien - feng , a florist who often works for the television and entertainment industries , has had plenty to sigh about .
example.arg: Wang Nien - feng , a florist who often works for the television and entertainment industries
